description: Returns either information about the working draft ( DRAFT version) of each prompt in an account, or information about of all versions of a prompt, depending on whether you include the promptIdentifier field or not. For more information, see View information about prompts using Prompt management in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.

nested_items.name: promptSummaries
nested_items.description: A list, each member of which contains information about a prompt using Prompt management.
